name: Virus Evader
description:
Simple, primitive yet somewhat fun game. It can help you to pass the time while you're waiting or something.

Platform: Windows

Players: 1-2

Controllers: keyboard, gamepad

Gameplay: fast, 30-90 seconds per round

Controls:
1st Player: WASD + N.
2nd Player: Arrows + Num2.

You play as a cell and you need to evade from hostile virus cells and collect friendly cells. In every round you need to endure a certain amount of time (30-90 sec) without losing all your energy on collision with hostile cells. Before each round a random class is assigned to each player. There is 22 different classes in the game and each have different abilities that sometimes alter the gameplay in that round.

Tip: gamepad should be plugged-in before the game is started.

Have fun!
